[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [FlyoutButton](./blockly.flyoutbutton_class.md)

## FlyoutButton class

Class for a button or label in the flyout.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class FlyoutButton implements IBoundedElement, IRenderedElement, IFocusableNode 
```
**Implements:** [IBoundedElement](./blockly.iboundedelement_interface.md)<!-- -->, [IRenderedElement](./blockly.irenderedelement_interface.md)<!-- -->, [IFocusableNode](./blockly.ifocusablenode_interface.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `FlyoutButton` class.

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [BORDER\_RADIUS](./blockly.flyoutbutton_class.border_radius_property.md) | <code>static</code> | number | The radius of the flyout button's borders. |
|  [cursorSvg](./blockly.flyoutbutton_class.cursorsvg_property.md) |  | SVGElement \| null | Holds the cursors svg element when the cursor is attached to the button. This is null if there is no cursor on the button. |
|  [height](./blockly.flyoutbutton_class.height_property.md) |  | number | The height of the button's rect. |
|  [info](./blockly.flyoutbutton_class.info_property.md) |  | [toolbox.ButtonOrLabelInfo](./blockly.utils_namespace.toolbox_namespace.buttonorlabelinfo_typealias.md) |  |
|  [TEXT\_MARGIN\_X](./blockly.flyoutbutton_class.text_margin_x_property.md) | <code>static</code> | number | The horizontal margin around the text in the button. |
|  [TEXT\_MARGIN\_Y](./blockly.flyoutbutton_class.text_margin_y_property.md) | <code>static</code> | number | The vertical margin around the text in the button. |
|  [width](./blockly.flyoutbutton_class.width_property.md) |  | number | The width of the button's rect. |
